vlive.korean: 저도 응모한 거죠? Did I apply it, right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [AB6IX] 답을 줘가 벌써 막방일 리가 없썽.. 시간 돌려줭..😭😭 (AB6IX’s V after last performance for ‘THE ANSWER’)
전설 속 동물 그런거죠? Mystical creature, right? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 65
그거 물어본 거죠? - 어! Are they asking us? - Yeah. 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 룸메즈의 간식타임!
춤을 언제부터 추게 된 거죠? When did you start dancing? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.24 드립 : 세븐틴 갓 탤런트 #2 (Ad-lib : Seventeen's got Talent #2)
어떤 공연 말씀하시는 거죠? '제이미' 공연인가? What stage? "Jamie"? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 엠췌이 먹방이래요✌️

examples.korean: Why should you deprive yourself of such simple pleasures? 발음듣기 왜 스스로에게서 그처럼 소박한 기쁨을 빼앗는 거죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Why should you deprive yourself of such simple pleasures? 발음

examples.korean: Who’s the money for? 발음듣기 그 돈은 누구 거죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
It’s a nice table! The only problem is (that) it’s too big for our room. 발음듣기 그건 멋진 탁자예요! 유일한 문제점은 우리 방에 두기엔 너무 크다는 거죠. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It’s a nice table! The only problem is (that) it’s too big for our room. 발음

examples.korean: Are we in agreement about the price? 발음듣기 우리가 가격에 동의하는 거죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Are we in agreement about the price? 발음

examples.korean: Where does her attitude come from? 발음듣기 그녀의 태도는 어디서 비롯된 거죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Where does her attitude come from? 발음
